long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Upload Photo or Video to Instagram.

EasyLoad is a Chrome extension which makes uploading Image or Video to Instagram from desktop possible. You can upload any photo or video to Story or Feed from you PC without any additional apps or complicated actions.

Normally Instagram doesn't allow to upload anything in it's web version, that's why we created a tool which makes uploading photo and video fast and handy. You can now create Story or Post right from your PC or laptop.

You can upload any image or video to create a great Reels, Posts, and Carousels. You can upload any image or video to create a great Reels, Posts, and Carousels. 

With EasyLoad you can also:
‚ùáÔ∏è Trim video
‚ùáÔ∏è Use filters
‚ùáÔ∏è Mark location
‚ùáÔ∏è Tag people
‚ùáÔ∏è Turn on/off comments and likes on your Posts
‚ùáÔ∏è Upload Video directly to feed (not to reels)
‚ùáÔ∏è Upload Video or Picture to IG stories

‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•Instagram is always better with EasyLoad.üî•
long.da,es,fr,ja,no:
Insta Uploader for posting Photos or Videos to Instagram right from you PC.

EasyLoad is a Chrome addon which allows uploading Image or Video to IG from desktop. You can upload any photo or video to Story or Feed from you PC without any additional apps or complicated actions.

Normally Instagram doesn't allow uploading anything in it's web version, that's why we created extension which makes uploading photo and video fast and handy. You can now create Story, Post, Reel, Carousels right from your PC or laptop.

Upload any image or video to create a great Reel, Post, or Carousel to Instagram in a few clicks. 

With EasyLoad you can also:
-	Trim video
-	Use filters
-	Mark location
-	Tag people
-	Turn on/off comments and likes under your Posts
-   	Upload Video directly to feed (not to reels)
-  	Upload Video or Image to IG stories

Instagram is always better with EasyLoad.
